QuestData.Title: Island In A Storm
QuestData.Description:
There has been little time to rest. The elementals' assault is relentless!
A moment of respite would be welcome and allow me to craft more wards for our defense.
See what you can do to thin out the onslaught on our perimeter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Eliminate $1oa Blazing Manifestations and Melter Igneous.
